page.title: 20Bracknell 1985
page.content: Bracknell is a well planned,pleasant place in which to live.It is close to the M3 and M4 motorways,convenient for Wales,London and the whole of Southern England. Road safety is a major factor with many underpasses and cycleways. The town is notorious for the numerous roundabouts - more than fifteen - but there are few accidents. The town is still growing.More houses and industrial units are planned for the area near to Amen Corner.The new { {Leisure Complex}is well under way.It will include a ski-slope,skating rink and garden centre. Since 1949 Bracknell has changed from a village to a town of more than 50,000,comprising nine neighbourhood areas,a town centre and excellent leisure facilities.
